name: Hanachirusato
desc: A mysterious shrine maiden from the Grand Narukami Shrine.

value.name: Hanachirusato
value.desc:
Persistence of Pain: Hanachirusato

"When shall we meet again after this parting? For life is like the morning dew."

customize.name: Kitsune Saiguu
customize.desc: A Kitsune from the Hakushin clan, who was worshiped as a kitsune goddess. She died 500 years ago during the Cataclysm.

customize.name: Khaenri'ahn cataclysm
customize.desc: A disaster that occurred 500 years ago. The Abyss was released into Teyvat and Khaenri'ah was destroyed.

customize.text: , Kitsune Saiguu was corrupted by the Abyss, and her body and mind were absorbed by the dark will. Her memories returned from filth in the form of Hanachirusato.

customize.name: Kamuna Harunosuke
customize.desc: The creator of the Mystic Onmyou Chamber, who lived about 500 years ago.

customize.text: Although Kamuna Harunosuke knew that Hanachirusato was not the real Kitsune Saiguu but filth, he helped her with the Sacred Sakura Cleansing ritual and didn't harm her.

customize.name: Mask of Memories
customize.desc:
Kazari the shrine maiden used to wear this mask. It is deeply stained on the inside.
Some memories are contained inside, through which one may learn the art of creating the Catalyst known as "Hakushin Ring."
Now that Kazari has been separated from this mask, Paimon doesn't get to call her the "Masked Maiden" anymore, right?

customize.name: Hakushin Ring
customize.desc: A catalyst that carries the memory of the Kitsune Saiguu of ancient times. However, this device is but an impoverished vessel for the full breadth of her thought.
